name: Sika Sarnafil PVC Sheet Membrane Checklist
Surface conditions suitable for installation-details in comments below
Moisture test complete-result in comments below
Substrate must be clean, smooth, dry and free from dust or contaminants. All sharp points and loose material to be removed
Application of Sarnacol Adhesive to substrate
Application of Felt PVC Sheet Membrane
Application of Non-Felt PVC Sheet Membrane
PVC Sheet Membrane Detailing as required
Final Walk over and inspection by main contractor, Supplier and Applicator if Applicable
Test 2 Air Test Pass/Fail (if double seam weld is done otherwise revert test 1)
